Our spacious, open setting features floor-to-ceiling windows that offer stunning views of the Ashley River, creating the perfect backdrop for a lively night out. You can also enjoy these panoramic views from our wrap-around deck, complete with a bar and easily accessible by boat. Whether you're craving low country favorites or our famous prime rib, California Dreaming is a favorite among both locals and tourists. Please note that we provide Advance Priority Seating to reduce wait times and expedite the seating process when your entire party arrives. To ensure the best experience for all guests, we seat groups of up to 6. While larger groups are seated separately, this arrangement is flexible during quieter hours. 1 Ashley Point Dr Charleston, SC 29407 Directions 843.766.1644 Order Now Reserve Hours Open Today Sunday 11am-9pm Open Today - Sunday 11am-9pm Monday 4pm-9pm Tuesday 4pm-9pm Wednesday 4pm-9pm Thursday 4pm-9pm Friday 4pm-10pm Saturday 11am-10pm | Catering Curbside to-go facebook instagram DINE DINE | DRINK | WINE | KIDS | DESSERT | ASHLEY PATIO DINE Apps She Crab Soup 9.95 A rich and creamy Charleston classic Steamed Peel & Eat Shrimp Old Bay boil, served with cocktail sauce 1/2lb 13.95 Fried Crab Claws 17.95 Served with spicy cocktail sauce. Open for lunch and dinner, featuring patio dining and online ordering with curbside pickup. To ensure the best experience for all guests, we seat groups of up to 6. 3241 Washington Rd. The restaurant's floor-to-ceiling windows offer a picturesque view of the rail tracks, stretching from the inactive platform to the main terminal. Paired with our hearty, made-from-scratch menu, it's no wonder California Dreaming has been a beloved local institution since 1984. Open for lunch and dinner daily, including online ordering with curbside pickup. Celebrating 40 years, California Dreaming has been a valued part of the Columbia community. Union Station, its historic home, was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1973. Please note that we provide Advance Priority Seating to reduce wait times and expedite the seating process when your entire party arrives. To ensure the best experience for all guests, we seat groups of up to 8.
